import React, { useRef } from 'react' import './TermsPage.component.scss' import { motion } from "framer-motion" import terms from '../../data/terms.txt' import cookies from '../../data/cookies.txt' import TextFileReader from '../../components/TextFileReader/TextFileReader.component' import {ReactComponent as Up} from '../../assets//up.svg' import { useViewportScroll } from "framer-motion" export default function TermsPage(props) { const termsRef = useRef() function handleBackClick() { termsRef.current.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }) } return (

Termeni si conditii

Politica de cookies

 ) }
